title: MISO-GINGER DRESSING
directions: In a blender, combine all ingredients except the oil. Blend until the walnuts are finely ground and the dressing is smooth, about 1 minute. Add the oil and blend until emulsified, about 30 seconds.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon grated lemon zest, plus ¼ cup lemon juice (1 to 2 lemons)
1 -ounce piece fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
½ cup grapeseed or other neutral oil
